info.title: The Selling Partner API for CustomerFeedback
info.description: The Selling Partner API for Customer Feedback (Customer Feedback API) provides information about customer reviews and returns at both the item and browse node level.

get.description: Retrieve an item's ten most positive and ten most negative review topics.

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) is the unique identifier of a product within a marketplace. The value must be a child ASIN.

parameters.name: marketplaceId
parameters.description: The MarketplaceId is the globally unique identifier of a marketplace, you can refer to the marketplaceId here : https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/marketplace-ids.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The metric by which to sort data in the response.

x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit.description: Your rate limit (requests per second) for this operation.

example.itemName: LANTEFUL 10 Tiers Tall Shoe Rack 20-25 Pairs Boots Organizer Storage Sturdy Narrow Shoe Shelf for Entryway Closets with Hooks Black

get.description: This API returns the associated browse node of the requested ASIN. A browse node is a location in a browse tree that is used for navigation, product classification, and website content on the Amazon retail website.

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) is the unique identifier of a product within a marketplace.

parameters.name: marketplaceId
parameters.description: The MarketplaceId is the globally unique identifier of a marketplace, you can refer to the marketplaceId here : https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/marketplace-ids.

get.description: Retrieve an item's positive and negative review trends for the past six months.

parameters.name: marketplaceId
parameters.description: The MarketplaceId is the globally unique identifier of a marketplace, you can refer to the marketplaceId here : https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/marketplace-ids.

get.description: Retrieve the positive and negative review trends of items in a browse node for the past six months.

get.description: Retrieve the topics that customers mention when they return items in a browse node.

parameters.name: browseNodeId

parameters.name: marketplaceId
parameters.description: The MarketplaceId is the globally unique identifier of a marketplace, you can refer to the marketplaceId here : https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/marketplace-ids.

get.description: Retrieve the trends of topics that customers mention when they return items in a browse node.

parameters.name: browseNodeId
parameters.description: A browse node ID is a unique identifier of a browse node. A browse node is a named location in a browse tree that is used for navigation, product classification, and website content.

parameters.name: marketplaceId
parameters.description: The MarketplaceId is the globally unique identifier of a marketplace, you can refer to the marketplaceId here : https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/marketplace-ids.

browseNodeId.description: A browse node id is the unique identifier of a given browse node. A browse node is a location in a browse tree that is used for navigation, product classification, and website content.

displayName.description: The display name of the browse node as visible on the Amazon retail website.

asin.description: The requested ASIN. The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) is the unique identifier of a product within a marketplace.

itemName.description: The product title of the requested ASIN.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code of the requested marketplace id, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

positiveTopics.description:
A list of the most positive review topics. When the `sortBy` query parameter is set to `MENTIONS`, the number of reviews that mention the topic determines the topic's placement in the list. When `sortBy` is set to `STAR_RATING_IMPACT`, the effect that the topic has on the star rating of the item determines placement in the list. This value is `null` if there are not enough positive reviews for the specified ASIN.

**Max length:** 10

negativeTopics.description:
A list of the most negative review topics. When the `sortBy` query parameter is set to `MENTIONS`, the number of reviews that mention the topic determines the topic's placement in the list. When `sortBy` is set to `STAR_RATING_IMPACT`, the effect that the topic has on the star rating of the item determines placement in the list. This value is `null` if there are not enough negative reviews for the specified ASIN.

**Max length:** 10

ItemReviewTopics.description: The top 10 positive and negative item review topics.

topic.description: The name of the item review topic.

reviewSnippets.description: A list of up to three snippets from reviews that contain the topic. This value is `null` if there aren't enough review snippets for the topic.

subtopics.description: A list of up to five top subtopics for the topic. The percentage of customer reviews that mention the subtopic determine the topic's placement in the list. This value is `null` if there are no subtopics.

reviewSnippets.description: A list of up to three snippets from reviews that contain the subtopic. This value is `null` if there aren't enough review snippets for the subtopic.

ItemReviewSubtopic.description: Details of the subtopic for an item review topic.

occurrencePercentage.description: The percentage of reviews that mention the subtopic.

BrowseNodeReviewSubtopicMetrics.description: The browse node review subtopic metrics.

numberOfMentions.description: The number of times that reviews mention the subtopic.

occurrencePercentage.description: The percentage of reviews that mention the subtopic.

ItemReviewBrowseNodeMetrics.description: The browse node review topic metrics.

numberOfMentions.description: The number of times that reviews mention the topic. This value is `null` if reviews do not mention the topic frequently enough.

occurrencePercentage.description: The percentage of customer reviews that mention the topic. This value is `null` if reviews do not mention the topic frequently enough.

starRatingImpact.description: The effect of the topic on the star rating of the ASIN. This value can be positive or negative. This value is `null` if the topic does't affect the star rating of the ASIN.

ChildAsinMetrics.description: The review topic metrics for other child ASINs that have the same parent ASIN. This value is `null` if there isn't any child ASIN metric data.

asin.description: The child ASIN of the requested item.

numberOfMentions.description: The number of times reviews of the child ASIN mention the topic.

ChildAsinMentionMetrics.description: The child ASIN review topic mention metrics.

startDate.description: The start date of the date range in ISO-8601 date/time format.

endDate.description: The end date of the date range in ISO-8601 date/time format.

browseNodeId.description: The requested browse node id. A browse node id is the unique identifier of a given browse node.

displayName.description: The display name of the requested browse node id. The display name of the browse node as visible on the Amazon retail website.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code of requested marketplace id, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

positiveTopics.description:
A list of the most positive review topics. When the `sortBy` query parameter is set to `MENTIONS`, the number of reviews of items within the requested browse node that mention the topic determine the topic's placement in the list. When `sortBy` is set to `STAR_RATING_IMPACT`, the effect that the topic has on the star rating of items within the requested browse node determine placement in the list. This value is `null` if there are not enough positive reviews for the requested browse node.

**Max length:** 10

negativeTopics.description:
A list of the most negative review topics. When the `sortBy` query parameter is set to `MENTIONS`, the number of reviews of items within the requested browse node that mention the topic determine the topic's placement in the list. When `sortBy` is set to `STAR_RATING_IMPACT`, the effect that the topic has on the star rating of items within the requested browse node determine placement in the list. This value is `null` if there are not enough negative reviews for the requested browse node.

**Max length:** 10

BrowseNodeReviewTopics.description: The 10 most positive and most negative review topics for all items in a browse node.

topic.description: The name browse node review topic.

reviewSnippets.description: A list of up to three snippets from reviews that contain the topic. This value is `null` if there aren't enough review snippets for the topic.

subtopics.description: A list of the five subtopics that occur most frequently. This value is `null` if there are no subtopics.

subtopic.description: The name of the browse node review subtopic.

reviewSnippets.description: A list of up to three snippets from reviews that contain the topic. This value is `null` if there aren't enough review snippets for the subtopic.

BrowseNodeReviewTopicMetrics.description: The browse node review topic metrics.

allProducts.description: The percentage of reviews of products in the browse node that mention a topic.

BrowseNodeOccurrence.description: The browse node review trend occurrence metrics.

topTwentyFivePercentProducts.description: The effect of the topic on the star rating of the top 25 percent of products in the browse node. This value can be positive or negative.

allProducts.description: The effect of the topic on the star rating of all products in the browse node. This value can be positive or negative.

BrowseNodeAllStarRatingImpact.description: The effects of a topic on the star ratings in a browse node.

allProducts.description: The effect of the topic on the star rating for all products in this browse node. This value can be positive or negative.

BrowseNodeStarRatingImpact.description: The effects of a topic on a browse node's star rating.

asin.description: The requested ASIN. The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) is the unique identifier of a product within a marketplace.

itemName.description: The product title of the requested ASIN.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code of the requested marketplace id, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

positiveTopics.description:
A list of the most positive review topics. The percentage of reviews that contain the topic determines the topic's placement in the list. This value is `null` if there are not enough positive reviews for the specified ASIN.

**Max length:** 10

negativeTopics.description:
A list of the most negative review topics. The percentage of reviews that contain the topic determines the topic's placement in the list. This value is `null` if there are not enough negative reviews for the specified ASIN.

**Max length:** 10

ItemReviewTrends.description: The 10 most positive and most negative review topics for all items in a browse node.

topic.description: The name of the item review topic.

trendMetrics.description: The item's review trend metrics for the past six months.

ItemReviewTrend.description: The trend of review topic metrics for the requested item.

ItemReviewTrendPoint.description: The review metrics for a certain month.

occurrencePercentage.description: The percentage of reviews that mention the topic.

browseNodeId.description: The requested browse node id. A browse node id is the unique identifier of a given browse node.

displayName.description: The display name of the requested browse node id. The display name of the browse node as visible on the Amazon retail website.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code of requested marketplace id, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

positiveTopics.description:
The trends of the most positive review topics. The percentage of reviews that contain the topic across all products in the requested browse node determine the topic's placement in the list. This value is `null` if there aren't enough positive reviews for the requested browse node.

**Max length:** 10

negativeTopics.description:
The trends of the most negative review topics. The percentage of reviews that contain the topic across all products in the requested browse node determine the topic's placement in the list. This value is `null` if there aren't enough positive reviews for the requested browse node.

**Max length:** 10

BrowseNodeReviewTrends.description: The 10 most positive and most negative review topics for all items in a browse node.

trendMetrics.description: The browse node's review trend metrics for the past six months.

BrowseNodeReviewTrend.description: The trend of review topic metrics for all items in the requested browse node.

BrowseNodeReviewTrendPoint.description: The browse node's review metrics for a certain month.

BrowseNodeReviewTrendMetrics.description: The browse node review topic metrics.

topTwentyFivePercentProducts.description: The percentage of reviews of the top 25 percent of products in the browse node that mention the topic.

allProducts.description: The percentage of reviews of products in the browse node that mention the topic.

BrowseNodeAllOccurrence.description: The browse node review occurrence metrics.

browseNodeId.description: The requested browse node id. A browse node id is the unique identifier of a given browse node.

displayName.description: The display name of the browse node, as visible on the Amazon retail website.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code of requested marketplace id, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

topics.description: The list of browse node return topics.

topic.description: The name of the return feedback topic .

BrowseNodeReturnTopics.description: Topics from returns for all items in a browse node.

browseNodeId.description: The requested browse node id. A browse node id is the unique identifier of a given browse node.

displayName.description: The display name of the browse node, as visible on the Amazon retail website.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code of requested marketplace id, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

trendMetrics.description: The browse node return trend metrics.

BrowseNodeReturnTrend.description: The trend of return topic metrics for all items in the requested browse node.

BrowseNodeReturnTrendPoint.description: The return metrics for a certain month.

BrowseNodeTrendMetrics.description: A single browse node review or return trend metric.

ErrorList.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

code.description: An error code that identifies the type of error that occurred.

message.description: A message that describes the error condition.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or fix the issue.

Error.description: Error response returned when the request is unsuccessful.

example.details: The requested ASIN is not valid.
